para.text: A child support enforcement privatization program may operate in Baltimore City.
The Secretary may contract with private companies to privatize any of the Department's child support enforcement functions, including:
Collecting and disbursing support payments; and
Reviewing and modifying child support orders.
A private company contracted by the Department to provide child support enforcement services shall comply with:
Federal and State laws and regulations governing child support enforcement services under Title IV-D of the Social Security Act; and
Policy directives issued by the Child Support Administration.

A private contractor may not use information obtained in the provision of child support enforcement services for purposes other than the child support enforcement program or purposes specified under COMAR 07.01.02.

annotations.annotation: Family Law Article, §10-114, Annotated Code of Maryland
